item.title: Anti-fraud with AVSession
item.description: In one of our apps, I should do something called “hidden photos”. I’ll explain it. This is not spying for our users for sure. This feature was implemented for an enterprise application, users as employees use a camera in the main process of their job. So our client wants to be sure they don’t trick and make real photos of real objects. The real scenario is to make hidden photos every 10 seconds.
